machine_start_gcode.default_value:
M104 S{material_print_temperature_preheat};预热热端
M190 S{material_bed_temperature} ;等待热床加热
M109 S{material_print_temperature} ;等待热端加热
G92 E0
G1 E-10 F1200
G28 ;home
G1 Z0.8 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X1.5 Y20 F5000.0 ;Move to start position
G1 Y80.0 F400.0 E35 ;Draw the first line
G1 X0.5 F5000.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 Y20 F540.0 E55 ;Draw the second line
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;Relative positionning
G1 E-2 F2700 ;Retract a bit
G1 E-15 Z0.2 F1000 ;Retract and raise Z
G1 X5 Y5 F3000 ;Wipe out
G1 Z10 ;Raise Z more
G90 ;Absolute positionning
G1 X0 Y{machine_depth} ;Present print
M106 S0 ;Turn-off fan
M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
